about_the_game:
Get Ready for the Challenge in Loopsters – A Game Like No Other!

Start your adventure deep in a dangerous underworld, tied together by a rope with your teammates as you try to escape. The only way out? Climb as high as you can, mastering every jump and working together to reach the top.

Whether you play alone or with friends, your goal is simple: climb out of the inferno and face the tricky worlds ahead.

Explore Different Environments and Gameplay

From the glowing Light Purple Mode to the dark and spooky Dungeon Mode, and the shiny heights of Gold Mode, each world brings new obstacles. Unlock and explore different maps, each with its own challenges to keep you engaged

Fun Game Modes for Everyone

  • Single Player with Checkpoints: Play solo with checkpoints to help you recover after tough falls. Move through many maps and face exciting landscapes.

  • Multiplayer Mayhem: Play with up to 6 friends, grouped into pairs for competitive fun! With 2 players tied together by a rope, every move matters as you work together to outclimb your opponents.

Realistic Rope Physics, True Challenges

The rope isn’t just decoration—it’s an essential part of the gameplay! It reacts to the platforms, wrapping around and pulling you, adding an extra layer of difficulty that will test your teamwork and coordination.

name: Loopsters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600@ 3.1 GHz or AMD R5 1600X @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or equivalent
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A high-speed internet connection and a good connection between players are required to play online
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400 3.1 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 2600x 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A high-speed internet connection and a good connection between players are required to play online

short_description: Loopsters is a cooperative platformer where players are tied together by a rope, racing to escape dangerous environments. Play solo or with up to 6 friends in competitive multiplayer. Overcome obstacles, master unique environments, and work together to climb to the top.
